item.title: About
item.description: I am a Software Engineer in the financial and health services industries. I am also a co-author of the book Spring in Practice and have worked with the Spring Framework since its inception in 2002.

item.title: Visualizing Spring Dependencies
item.description: Over the last couple of months, I have been playing with Kotlin in my spare time. To get a better feel for the language, I decided to implement a small program that reads through a POM file and diagrams all of its dependencies using Graphviz and dot.

item.title: Moving My Blog to Hugo
item.description: I recently moved my blog to Hugo based on a the recommendation of a colleague. Its been so long since I have written a blog post (2 years!) that I didn’t bother to convert my old content.
